This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I was looking out the window and a shiny object caught my eye.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my room with my girlfriend and daughter. I started to look out the window to check out the weather. All of a sudden a shiny object caught my eye. I decided to keep looking at it. I stared at it for about five minutes and then i showed it to my girlfriend. We stared at it for about a minute or so. I asked my girlfriend to keep an eye on it while i went to the car to get the camera. I came back, and it was still there. I took three pictures of the object. The object came from the north and went south. It moved very slowly, then it stopped for a bit. Then it continued going south. And i lost track of it.
